[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] Choose a Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[C] During your turn, all your other '"It's Not Like I'm Waiting for You" Rena' gain +2000 Power.
[A] BOND/'"It's Not Like I'm Waiting for You" Rena' [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 1 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.

[C] During your turn, for each of your other ::Magic:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Pan-Pa-Pan-Hey! Perfect Calls!" is in the Climax Zone, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, put it in your hand. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
--None--

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your ::Magic:: Characters.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Magic:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] During your turn, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur. Put the revealed card back where it was)
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, choose up to 1 RED card in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock, and all your Characters gain +1 Soul for the turn.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +500 Power for the turn.
[C] During your Opponent's turn, if all your Characters are ::Magic::, this gains +1 Level and +1500 Power.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 1500, Level 1 [Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[C] For each of your other ::Magic:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.

[C] All your other ::Magic:: Characters gain +1000 Power.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Magic:: Characters, this gains +3000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Magic:: Characters, you may put the top card of your Library in your Stock.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your ::Magic:: Characters.

Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When this attacks, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, put it in your hand, choose up to 1 Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -3000 Power for the turn." (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Level 2 or lower Characters, and that Character gets -1 Level for the turn.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them back in the same order.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you may reveal up to 3 cards from top of your Library. If you reveal at least 1 card this way, choose up to 1 YELLOW Character among them, put it in your hand, put the rest in the Waiting Room, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] For each ::Magic:: Character in your Back Row, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Strongest at Basketball Too!" is in the Climax Zone, this gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent, and put up to 1 card from top of your Clock in the Waiting Room." (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, when the Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.
[C] You cannot play Events or BACKUP from hand.

[A] At the start of your Attack Phase, choose a Character in your Front Row, and if the Levels of all Characters in your Front Row are the same as the Level of that Character, this gains +3000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may return this to your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] During your turn, this gets -1 Level and gains +500 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "After School Invisible Girl" is in your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, that Character gains +1000 Power and +1 Soul for the turn, and this gains the following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[A] When this is Front Attacked, you may return this to your hand."

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Magic:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Unbalance That Feels Good" is in your Climax Zone, this gains +9000 Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn.

[A] BOND/"Kokoro Awane" [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [Put a YELLOW Character from your Stage in the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a YELLOW Character, put it in your hand. (Otherwise put it back where it was)

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, all Characters in your Opponent's Front Row get -1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 0, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[S] [(1) Send this to Memory] Put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST During your turn, all your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your other Level 2 or lower Characters, and that Character gets -1 Level and gains +500 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When "Napping on an Off-Day as Desired" is placed in your Climax Zone, if you are Level 2 or lower, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn. If you are Level 3 or higher, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -2000 Power for the turn.

[C] All your other "Mami Tomoe" gain +2000 Power.
[S] RESONANCE [(1) Reveal a "Mami Tomoe" from your hand, Rest this] Look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search up to 1 Character with "Mami" in name, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[C] If this is in the Front Row Center Slot, this gains +1 Soul.
[A] When this Direct Attacks, this gains +1 Soul for the turn.
[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card.

[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you use an [S] ability, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] Choose an "Asuka Tatsuki" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[C] If you have another '"Magical Girl VS Series?" Holy Mami', this gains +3000 Power.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer cards in your Stock, this cannot attack.
[C] During your turn, this gets -1 Level and gains +500 Power.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power and the following two abilities for the turn. "[C] During battles involving this, your Opponent cannot play BACKUP from hand." "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, search your Library for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library."
[Counter] Choose 1 of your Characters in battle and return it to your hand, choose a Character in your Front Row and move it to the Slot the Character in battle was in as Defending Character.

Choose 1 of your ::Magic:: Characters, and for the turn, that Character gains +5000 Power, +1 Soul, and the following ability. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When the Damage dealt by this is Cancelled, you may deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] At the start of your Climax Phase, if this is in the Front Row, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn, that Character either gains +1 Level or gets -1 Level.

[C] During your turn, for each of your other ::Magic:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your ::Magic:: Characters.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, put the top card of your Library in the Waiting Room. If it's a Character with the same name as a Character on your Stage, put that card in your Stock.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Magic:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.

"[A] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other ::Magic:: Character is Front Attacked, you may pay cost. If so, return that Character to your hand."

[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "The Time We Can't Go Back to" is in the Climax Zone, this gains +1000 Power and the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, from your Waiting Room, choose up to 1 'Hazuki Yusa' and up to 1 'Ayame Mikuri' and put them in your Stock in any order."

[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Endless Practice" is in your Climax Zone, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Magic:: Character, put it in your hand and choose a Level 1 or lower Character in your Opponent's Back Row. That Character does not Stand during your Opponent's next Stand Phase.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When your other ::Magic:: Character becomes Reversed in battle, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] If "Madoka, New Story" is in your Clock, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] During Attack Phase, all other Characters cannot move to another Slot.
[C] For each of your other ::Magic:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Magic:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and your Opponent puts that Character from Memory in any Slot on the Stage.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 ::Magic:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.

[A] [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters whose Level is higher than the Level of the Opponent and put it in the Waiting Room.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if there are 5 or fewer cards in your Library. return all cards in your Waiting Room to the Library. If so, shuffle that Library, and you may choose a "Tsukuyo Amane" in your Clock and put it in your Stock.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Draw a card.

[C] All your other ::Magic:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.

[C] During your Clock Phase, you may not put a Climax card from your hand in Clock in order to draw cards.

[C] This cannot Side Attack.

[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you use an [S] ability, this gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, your Opponent may draw a card. If so, your Opponent discards a card from his or her hand to the Waiting Room.

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Magic:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] This gets -2 Level while on the Stage.

If you are Level 1, choose a ::Magic:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
If you are Level 2, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to hand.
If you are Level 3, choose a ::Magic:: Character in your Clock and return it to your hand.

[Counter] Put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room. If there are no Climax cards among them, deal 4 Damage to your Opponent, and choose a Character in battle, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[C] This cannot deal Damage to a player." (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may Reverse that Character.

[S] BRAINNSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Draw up to 2 cards, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room."

[C] If all your Characters are ::Magic::, this gains +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]".
